text:
e="preserve">Landmark (formerly known as Parkers-Iron Springs) is a census-designated place (CDP) in Pulaski County, Arkansas, United States. The population was 3,555 at the 2010 census.
Geography.
Landmark is found at (34.609573, -92.321972).
According to the United States Census Bureau, the CDP has a total area of, of which, of it is land and of it (8.18%) is water.
There is a small lake, Landmark Lake.
